meanings.definition: The state or fact of not coinciding or occurring at the same time or in the same place.
meanings.sent1: The noncoincidence of their birthdays meant they never celebrated together.
meanings.sent2: There was a clear noncoincidence between their schedules, making it hard to meet.
meanings.sent3: The noncoincidence of their favorite colors led to a funny mix-up at the party.
meanings.sent4: The noncoincidence of their thoughts created a rift between them.
meanings.sent5: The noncoincidence of their paths made their friendship even more special.

meanings.sent1: The noncoincidence in their opinions often led to heated debates.
meanings.sent2: There was a noticeable noncoincidence in their stories about the event.
meanings.sent3: The noncoincidence in their tastes for pizza toppings always amused their friends.
meanings.sent4: The noncoincidence in their music preferences highlighted their diverse personalities.
meanings.sent5: The noncoincidence in their goals made collaboration difficult.
